publisher.value: HL7 Switzerland on behalf of Central Compensation Office CCO (CCO)

responsible.value: The Federal Department of Finance (FDF) / Central Compensation Office CCO

description.value: The AHVN13 / NAVS13 - (abbreviation for new thirteen-digit Social Security number) - is an administrative identifier for natural persons in Switzerland. It is issued, announced and administered by the [Central Compensation Office](https://www.zas.admin.ch/zas/de/home/partenaires-et-institutions-/navs13.html). It is available to all organisations and communities for which there is a legal basis. The AHVN13 / NAVS13 shall not contain point characters for separation.
